mapper.select: SELECT LICENSENUM FROM LICENSELIKE WHERE NUM=#{num}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R,L.* FROM (SELECT * FROM LICENSE
ORDER BY LICENSENUM ASC) L) WHERE R BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{lastRow} ) ORDER BY LICENSEHITS DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE LICENSE SET LICENSEHITS=LICENSEHITS+1 WHERE LICENSENUM=#{licenseNum}
mapper.select: SELECT LICENSENUM,LICENSENAME,LICENSEHITS FROM LICENSE WHERE LICENSENUM=#{licenseNum}

SELECT ROWNUM R,L.LICENSENAME,L.LICENSEHITS,B.BOOKNAME,B.BOOKPRICE,B.BOOKIMAGE FROM LICENSE L INNER JOIN LICENSEBOOK LB USING (LICENSENUM) INNER JOIN BOOK B USING (BOOKNUM) WHERE LICENSENUM=#{licenseNum} ORDER BY R ASC
SELECT ROWNUM R,L.LICENSENAME,V.VIDEOTITLE,V.VIDEOLINK FROM LICENSE L INNER JOIN LICENSEVIDEO LV USING (LICENSENUM) INNER JOIN VIDEO V USING (VIDEONUM) WHERE LICENSENUM=#{licenseNum} ORDER BY R ASC
SELECT ROWNUM R,L.LICENSENAME,J.JOBNAME,J.JOBINTRO FROM LICENSE L INNER JOIN LICENSEJOB LJ USING (LICENSENUM) INNER JOIN JOB J USING (JOBNUM) WHERE LICENSENUM=#{licenseNum} ORDER BY R ASC

SELECT ROWNUM R,L.LICENSENAME,S.SCHEDULENAME,S.SCHEDULEDATE FROM SCHEDULE S INNER JOIN LICENSESCHEDULE LS USING (SCHEDULENUM) INNER JOIN LICENSE L USING (LICENSENUM) WHERE LICENSENUM=#{licenseNum} ORDER BY R ASC

mapper.update: UPDATE BOOK SET BOOKNAME=#{bookName}, BOOKPRICE=#{bookPrice} WHERE BOOKNUM =#{bookNum}
UPDATE JOB SET JOBNAME=#{jobName}, JOBINTRO=#{jobIntro} WHERE JOBNUM =#{jobNum}

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM LICENSESCHEDULE WHERE SCHEDULENUM=( SELECT SCHEDULENUM FROM SCHEDULE WHERE SCHEDULENAME=#{scheduleName} and SCHEDULEDATE=#{scheduleDate})
DELETE FROM LICENSEBOOK WHERE BOOKNUM=( SELECT BOOKNUM FROM BOOK WHERE BOOKNAME=#{bookName} and BOOKPRICE=#{bookPrice})
DELETE FROM LICENSEVIDEO WHERE VIDEONUM=( SELECT VIDEONUM FROM VIDEO WHERE VIDEOTITLE=#{videoTitle} and VIDEOLINK=#{videoLink})
DELETE FROM LICENSEJOB WHERE JOBNUM=( SELECT JOBNUM FROM JOB WHERE JOBNAME=#{jobName} and JOBINTRO=#{jobIntro})
